content: HIT-FP 700 R Injectable cementitious adhesive anchor Injectable cementitious adhesive anchor for fire-resistant structural rebar connections ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Fire-resisting cementitious adhesive anchor with bond strength performance compared with a cast-in rebar even at temperatures up to 500°C – HIT-FP 700 R provides you the possibility of an efficient and code-compliant solution for most fire-rated structural connections e.g. EC2, Part 1 Extensive range of assessment documents – ETA documentation for fire, static and 100 year working life available Compatible with the Hilti SafeSet technique – save time on-site and minimize room for installation errors by using hollow drill bits with a compatible Hilti vacuum cleaner Easier to handle – this cementitious adhesive anchor is compatible with your existing Hilti adhesive dispensers, helping to minimize wastage and time, especially when used with Hilti HDE battery-powered dispensers Specifier support available – use Hilti PROFIS Engineering software to simplify the design of post-installed fire-rated concrete-to-concrete connections, or contact your local Hilti Engineering Team for advice on complex projects Applications Fire-rated post-installed rebar connections, including splice connections between new and existing concrete, new columns, column and beam extensions and closing of openings Post-installed concrete-to-concrete civil applications, including bridge extensions and diaphragm trench walls Compared to vinylester and epoxy mortars, FP 700 R is characterized by a longer curing process, similar to normal weight concrete. This product is engineered in such a way as to allow a seamless integration with current state-of-the-art rebar installation processes ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) Approvals / Test reports: ETA, Fire Seismic loading: Yes Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | Base material condition (as per approval) | Dry, Wet | Approvals / Test reports | ETA, Fire | Seismic loading | Yes | PROFIS Software | Yes | Anchoring elements | Rebar | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 320 °F | Free of styrene | Yes ### ITEMS- 2330579 - Injectable mortar HIT FP 700 R 490/1/WH - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil pack - 1x Mixer - 1x Mixer extension - 3834351 - FP 700 R 1 MC 500ml w/ Black Cart. - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 20x Foil pack - 20x Mixer - 20x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 3834604 - FP700 R 1 MC HDE22 w/ 1x bat & charger - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDE 500-22 HNA Cordl. dispenser assy - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 20x Foil pack - 20x Mixer - 20x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 1x B 22-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3834352 - FP 700 R 2 MC 500ml w/ Black Cart. - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 40x Foil pack - 40x Mixer - 40x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 3834605 - FP700 R 2 MC HDE22 w/ 1x bat & charger - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDE 500-22 HNA Cordl. dispenser assy - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 40x Foil pack - 40x Mixer - 40x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 1x B 22-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 3834603 - FP 700 R 5 MC 500ml w/ Black Cart. - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 100x Foil pack - 100x Mixer - 100x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 3834606 - FP700 R 5 MC HDE22 w/ 1x bat & charger - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDE 500-22 HNA Cordl. dispenser assy - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 100x Foil pack - 100x Mixer - 100x Mixer extension - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 1x B 22-55 Li-ion Battery pack -
